description: Complete analytics map for ticket/pass validation across all products - BLE validation, QR code validation, conductor validation, tap-in/tap-out (TITO), vehicle-based validation, and punch notifications.

productType.description: Product type being validated (exact values vary by product).

productSubType.description: Product sub-type (exact values vary by product).

productSubtype.description: Product subtype used by TwoWayBleCommPilot logger (note spelling differs from productSubType).

isSuperPass.description: Whether the product is a super pass.

bookingId.description: Booking ID for validation (used by some products/events).

passId.description: Pass/booking ID for validation (used by some products/events).

orderId.description: Order ID for order-based products (instant ticket, metro, ONDC, Quick Pay, etc.).

productId.description: Product ID present on receipt events for some products.

isChaloPay.description: Whether this is a Quick Pay (Chalo Pay) order.

isInstantTicket.description: Whether this is an Instant Ticket order.

isPremiumReserveTicket.description: Whether this is a Premium Reserve Ticket.

isOndcTicketOrder.description: Whether this is an ONDC ticket order.

validationAckDataType.description: Type of ACK data received during validation.

wasTitoValidation.description: True if the post-validation action happened after a TITO validation (note: some implementations may serialize this as a string).

notificationDeliveryMedium.description: Medium through which validation notification/ACK was delivered.

activationTime.description: Activation timestamp (usually epoch millis; some legacy events may send a formatted string under the same key).

punchTime.description: Punch/validation timestamp (usually epoch millis/seconds; some legacy events may send a formatted string under the same key).

punch notification delay.description: Delay between punch time and notification received (milliseconds).

chalo pay trip amount.description: Quick Pay trip amount as emitted on receipt events.

failureReason.description: Detailed failure reason for syncing failures.

rawData.description: Raw data payload for debugging (invalid data scenarios).

number of trips.description: Number of trips in the itinerary (trip planner integration).

type.description: Report problem type/category (exact values owned by report-problem feature).

fullName.description: User full name added by some validation analytics managers.

time.description: Time string added by some validation analytics managers.

date.description: Date string added by some validation analytics managers.

notif bookingId.description: Booking/order ID as received in the TITO notification payload.

notif productType.description: Product type as received in the TITO notification payload.

notif productSubtype.description: Product subtype as received in the TITO notification payload.

groupNo.description: Group number from TITO notification payload.

notif firstTimeValidScanTS.description: First valid scan timestamp from TITO notification payload.

notif activationTsInSec.description: Activation timestamp (seconds) from TITO notification payload.

notif routeId.description: Route ID from TITO notification payload.

notif stopId.description: Stop ID from TITO notification payload.

notif tripNo.description: Trip number from TITO notification payload.

notif waybillNo.description: Waybill number from TITO notification payload.

notif timeTakenToGetNotificationInSec.description: Time taken to get notification in seconds (as emitted).

notif tapinPunchTsInMillis.description: Tap-in punch timestamp in millis (as emitted).

notif timeTakenFromPunchToAppNotifReceiv.description: Time from punch to notification received (as emitted).

notif walletId.description: Wallet ID from TITO notification payload (Quick Pay only).

notif expiryTime.description: Expiry time from TITO notification payload (Quick Pay only).

source.description: Source (Source enum value) as emitted by TwoWayBleCommPilot logger.

connectionId.description: Connection ID for TwoWayBleCommPilot events (note: some events also emit connectionId{n} keys).

waybillNo.description: Waybill number extracted from TwoWayBleCommPilot data (when available).

etimTimestamp.description: ETIM timestamp extracted from TwoWayBleCommPilot data (when available).

padding.description: Padding extracted from TwoWayBleCommPilot data (when available).

timeSinceActModeBrCalled.description: Time elapsed since start active mode broadcast called (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceActModeBrFailed.description: Time elapsed since start active mode broadcast failed (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceActModeBrSuccess.description: Time elapsed since start active mode broadcast success (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceDupConnOpCalled.description: Time elapsed since start duplex connection op called (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceDupConnOpSuccess.description: Time elapsed since start duplex connection op success (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceDupConnOpFailed.description: Time elapsed since start duplex connection op failed (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceSendDataOnConnCalled.description: Time elapsed since send data on connection called (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceSendDataOnConnSuccess.description: Time elapsed since send data on connection success (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceSendDataOnConnFailed.description: Time elapsed since send data on connection failed (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceConnListUpdated.description: Time elapsed since BLE connection list updated (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceConnHistListUpdated.description: Time elapsed since BLE connection history list updated (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceDataReceivedOnConnection.description: Time elapsed since BLE data received on connection (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceStopBleValidationWithDelayCalle.description: Time elapsed since stop BLE validation with delay called (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceStopBleValidationSuccess.description: Time elapsed since stop BLE validation success (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceStopBleValidationFailed.description: Time elapsed since stop BLE validation failed (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceStopActiveModeBroadcastCalled.description: Time elapsed since stop active mode broadcast called (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

timeSinceStopAllBleOpAndSOBlCalled.description: Time elapsed since stop all BLE operations and switch off bluetooth called (TwoWayBleCommPilot).

events.name: start product validation
events.description: Generic product validation started.
triggers: Raised when user initiates validation for a product from summary/receipt screens.

events.name: validation product not found
events.description: Product not found when attempting validation.
triggers: Raised when validation is attempted but the product cannot be resolved.

events.name: super pass fetched
events.description: Super Pass validation product data fetched.
triggers: Raised when Super Pass product validation data is fetched in validation flow.

events.name: mticket fetched
events.description: M-Ticket validation product data fetched.
triggers: Raised when M-Ticket product validation data is fetched in validation flow.

events.name: premium reserve ticket fetched
events.description: Premium Reserve Ticket validation product data fetched.
triggers: Raised when Premium Reserve Ticket product validation data is fetched in validation flow.

events.name: instant ticket fetched
events.description: Instant Ticket validation product data fetched.
triggers: Raised when Instant Ticket product validation data is fetched in validation flow.

events.name: metro ticket fetched
events.description: Metro ticket validation product data fetched.
triggers: Raised when Metro ticket product validation data is fetched in validation flow.

events.name: ondc ticket fetched
events.description: ONDC ticket validation product data fetched.
triggers: Raised when ONDC ticket product validation data is fetched in validation flow.

events.name: ondc metro ticket fetched
events.description: ONDC metro ticket validation product data fetched.
triggers: Raised when ONDC metro ticket product validation data is fetched in validation flow.

events.name: chalo pay order fetched
events.description: Quick Pay (Chalo Pay) validation order fetched.
triggers: Raised when Quick Pay product validation data is fetched in validation flow.

events.name: ble screen open
events.description: BLE validation screen opened.
triggers: Raised when user enters BLE validation UI.

events.name: ble hardware not available on device
events.description: BLE hardware not available on user's device.
triggers: Raised when device does not support BLE hardware.

events.name: BLE permission check on validation initialization
events.description: BLE permission status checked when validation initializes.
triggers: Raised when validation checks BLE permission status.

events.name: BLE permission granted
events.description: User has granted BLE permissions.
triggers: Raised after permission update indicates BLE permission granted.

events.name: BLE permission denied
events.description: User has denied BLE permissions.
triggers: Raised after permission update indicates BLE permission denied.

events.name: BLE validation permission rationale screen opened
events.description: BLE permission rationale UI opened.
triggers: Raised when BLE permission rationale screen is opened.

events.name: BLE permission rationale accepted
events.description: User accepted BLE permission rationale.
triggers: Raised when user proceeds from BLE permission rationale.

events.name: BLE validation permission settings screen opened
events.description: User opened system settings from BLE permission UI.
triggers: Raised when user opens permission settings from validation flow.

events.name: BLE denial qr option shown
events.description: QR fallback option shown after BLE permission denial.
triggers: Raised when validation shows QR option due to BLE permission denial.

events.name: BLE denial use qr clicked
events.description: User chose to use QR after denying BLE permissions.
triggers: Raised when user selects QR fallback after BLE denial.

events.name: ble bottom sheet clicked
events.description: User clicked product/details bottom sheet on BLE validation screen.
triggers: Raised when user expands bottom sheet in BLE validation UI.

events.name: BLE validation help btn clicked
events.description: Help button clicked on BLE validation screen.
triggers: Raised when user clicks help from BLE validation UI.

events.name: BLE validation open qr btn clicked
events.description: User clicked to open QR from BLE validation screen.
triggers: Raised when user chooses to open QR from BLE validation UI.

events.name: BLE validation switch to qr got it clicked
events.description: User acknowledged switch-to-QR UI during BLE validation.
triggers: Raised when user clicks 'Got it' on switch-to-QR prompt.

events.name: exit chalo pay confirmation shown
events.description: Exit confirmation dialog shown (uses legacy Chalo Pay naming).
triggers: Raised when exit confirmation is shown on back press.

events.name: exit chalo pay confirmation yes clicked
events.description: User confirmed exit on back press (uses legacy Chalo Pay naming).
triggers: Raised when user confirms exit on back press.

events.name: exit chalo pay confirmation no clicked
events.description: User cancelled exit on back press (uses legacy Chalo Pay naming).
triggers: Raised when user cancels exit on back press.

events.name: qr validation screen help button clicked
events.description: Help button clicked on QR validation screen.
triggers: Raised when user taps help icon on QR validation UI.

events.name: qr validation screen view journey button clicked
events.description: View journey button clicked on QR validation screen.
triggers: Raised when user taps 'View Journey' on QR validation UI.

events.name: qr validation screen trip planner success
events.description: Trip planner call succeeded from QR validation screen.
triggers: Raised when trip planner returns itineraries from QR validation flow.

events.name: qr validation screen trip planner failed
events.description: Trip planner call failed from QR validation screen.
triggers: Raised when trip planner fails from QR validation flow.

events.name: mticket qr code zoomed
events.description: M-Ticket QR zoomed/opened.
triggers: Raised when user opens zoomed QR for M-Ticket.

events.name: super pass active qr zoomed screen opened
events.description: Super Pass active QR zoomed screen opened.
triggers: Raised when user opens zoomed QR for active Super Pass.

events.name: simple qr validation zoom qr clicked
events.description: Generic QR zoom clicked in validation flow (non Super Pass / non M-Ticket).
triggers: Raised when user taps zoom on QR for supported products that use generic zoom event.

events.name: report problem clicked v2
events.description: Report problem clicked from validation flow.
triggers: Raised when user taps report problem/help entry from validation flow.

events.name: mpass activation duration expired dialog shown
events.description: Product activation duration expired dialog shown in validation flow.
triggers: Raised when validation detects product has expired and shows expiry dialog.

events.name: activation duration expired dialog ok clicked
events.description: User dismissed activation expiry dialog.
triggers: Raised when user clicks OK/Got It on expiry dialog.

events.name: activation duration expired dialog view summary clicked
events.description: User chose to view summary from activation expiry dialog.
triggers: Raised when user clicks View Summary/See Details on expiry dialog.

events.name: tito tapIn notif recv on conductor flow
events.description: TITO tap-in notification received during conductor/unified flow.
triggers: Raised when a tap-in notification is received/processed during validation.

events.name: tito tapin polling stopped due to notification received
events.description: TITO tap-in polling stopped because a notification was received.
triggers: Raised when polling stops due to notification delivery.

events.name: valid tito tap in data received in polling
events.description: Valid TITO tap-in data received via polling.
triggers: Raised when polling yields valid tap-in data.

events.name: invalid tito tap in data received in polling
events.description: Invalid TITO tap-in data received via polling.
triggers: Raised when polling yields invalid tap-in data.

events.name: invalid ble validation ack data received
events.description: Invalid BLE validation ACK data received.
triggers: Raised when BLE ACK contains invalid/unsupported data.

events.name: ble validation ack data consumed
events.description: BLE validation ACK data consumed (first medium distribution analysis).
triggers: Raised when a validation ACK is consumed and attributed to a delivery medium.

events.name: syncing post ble validation failed
events.description: Syncing failed after BLE validation.
triggers: Raised when post-validation sync step fails.

events.name: view trip receipt from menu clicked
events.description: User clicked 'View trip receipt' from menu on validation UI.
triggers: Raised when user uses the menu option to view receipt from validation.

events.name: view receipt post validation clicked
events.description: Post-validation action clicked (used for both 'View Receipt' and 'Exit/Done' in current code).
triggers: Raised when user clicks post-validation CTA (view receipt or exit).

events.name: superPass trip punch
events.description: Super Pass trip punched by conductor.
triggers: Raised when Super Pass punch notification is received.

events.name: mTicket trip punch
events.description: M-Ticket trip punched by conductor.
triggers: Raised when M-Ticket punch notification is received.

events.name: premium reserve ticket trip punched
events.description: Premium Reserve Ticket punched by conductor.
triggers: Raised when Premium Reserve Ticket punch notification is received.

events.name: instant ticket trip punched
events.description: Instant ticket punched by conductor.
triggers: Raised when Instant Ticket receipt/punch is received.

events.name: metro ticket trip punched
events.description: Metro ticket punched/validated.
triggers: Raised when Metro ticket receipt/punch is received.

events.name: ondc ticket trip punched
events.description: ONDC bus ticket punched/validated.
triggers: Raised when ONDC ticket receipt/punch is received.

events.name: ondc metro ticket trip punched
events.description: ONDC metro ticket punched/validated.
triggers: Raised when ONDC metro ticket receipt/punch is received.

events.name: chalo pay ticket punched
events.description: Quick Pay (Chalo Pay) ticket punched/validated.
triggers: Raised when Quick Pay receipt/punch is received.

events.name: superPass receipt payload
events.description: Super Pass receipt payload captured (debug).
triggers: Raised when Super Pass punch event payload is recorded for debugging.

events.name: MTicketPunchedEvent receipt payload
events.description: M-Ticket punch payload captured (debug).
triggers: Raised when M-Ticket punch event payload is recorded for debugging.

events.name: premium reserve ticket receipt payload
events.description: Premium Reserve Ticket receipt payload captured (debug).
triggers: Raised when Premium Reserve Ticket punch event payload is recorded for debugging.

events.name: quickpay receipt payload
events.description: Quick Pay receipt payload captured (debug).
triggers: Raised when Quick Pay punch event receipt payload is recorded for debugging.

events.name: instantTicket receipt payload
events.description: Instant Ticket receipt payload captured (debug).
triggers: Raised when Instant Ticket punch event receipt payload is recorded for debugging.

events.name: ondc ticket receipt payload
events.description: ONDC ticket receipt payload captured (debug).
triggers: Raised when ONDC ticket punch event receipt payload is recorded for debugging.

events.name: BLE advertisement sent
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: BLE advertisement sent.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when active-mode advertising succeeds.

events.name: BLE advertisement sending failed
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: BLE advertisement sending failed.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when active-mode advertising fails.

events.name: start active mode broadcast called
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: start active mode broadcast called.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when advertising start is invoked.

events.name: start duplex connection op called
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: start duplex connection op called.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when duplex connection op starts.

events.name: start duplex connection op success
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: start duplex connection op success.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when duplex connection op succeeds.

events.name: start duplex connection op failed
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: start duplex connection op failed.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when duplex connection op fails.

events.name: send data on connection called
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: send data on connection called.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when sending data on connection starts.

events.name: send data on connection success
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: send data on connection success.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when sending data on connection succeeds.

events.name: send data on connection failed
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: send data on connection failed.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when sending data on connection fails.

events.name: ble connection list updated
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: BLE connection list updated.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when connection list changes.

events.name: ble connection history list updated
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: BLE connection history list updated.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when connection history list changes.

events.name: ble data received on connection
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: BLE data received on connection.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when BLE data is received.

events.name: stop ble validation with delay called
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: stop BLE validation with delay called.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when stopping validation with delay is invoked.

events.name: stop ble validation success
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: stop BLE validation success.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when stopping validation succeeds.

events.name: stop ble validation failed
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: stop BLE validation failed.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when stopping validation fails.

events.name: stop active mode broadcast called
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: stop active mode broadcast called.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when stop advertising is invoked.

events.name: stop all ble op and switch off bluetooth called
events.description: TwoWayBleCommPilot: stop all BLE operations and switch off bluetooth called.
triggers: Raised by TwoWayBleCommPilotLogger when stop-all BLE operations is invoked.
